            I like maps, because they lie.
            Because they give no access to the vicious truth.
            Because great-heartedly, good-naturedly
            they spread before me a world not of this world.
            (Map by Wislawa Szymborska - translated by Clare Cavanagh)
            
            My work samples
            Applied Spatial Analysis:
            COVID - 19 - notes 
            Safety Cameras
            Scottish Access to Bus Indicator - official publication 
            Population Clusters - notes 
            LiDAR - notes 
            Academia
            DOHA - Doha Online Historical Atlas - web app 
            PostgreSQL Database for CLASS Project
            BANEA Conference 2020 - poster 
            Random
            VUG in R
